title: Where did this icon come from?
body:
Icon on the top left... no idea how I got it? anyone know what its from?
Looks like a demented Ziggs

replies.body: oh strange, I only played it once when it first came out and the icon just showed up.... Thanks
You only needed to play it once, and as long as you didn't dodge, you'd get the icon! :]
Yeah, the icon was only set to appear AFTER the mode had left so that's why
It was from playing Nemesis Draft
